synopsis: In this heartfelt episode of 'Pineapple Plant Rotation', hosts Devam and Ahir dive deep into the emotional complexities of breakups, sharing personal experiences and insights. They discuss the importance of self-reflection, healing, and the journey of rediscovering oneself after a relationship ends, all while encouraging listeners to embrace their feelings and seek support from loved ones.
quotes: To love means to let go.
It's very easy to hold on to the things that give you the most comfort in a moment.
Healing means to get to a place where you feel whole by yourself.
Your feelings are real; if you push them down, they're going to come out in bad ways.
Everything's up in the air, and that's okay.
I think everyone on some level would benefit from therapy.
It's tough to be around couples when you're feeling down, but it's important to respect how you feel.
Sometimes, you just need to remind yourself that this too shall pass.
The happiest moments I've had were with my ex, and it's hard to navigate those memories alone.
Don't forget that asking for help is the hardest thing to do, but it's also one of the most important.
